devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing pins

PinCreated(uint256,string,string,string,.details: Event emitted when a new pin is created

params.boardId: of the board the pin belongs to
params.imageHash: IPFS hash of the pin's image
params.title: Title of the pin created

PinDeleted(uint256).details: Event emitted when a pin is deleted

PinEdited(uint256,string,string,uint256).details: Event emitted when a pin is edited

params.newDescription: New description of the pin edited
params.newTitle: New title of the pin edited

params.boardId: ID of the board the pin belongs to
params.imageHash: IPFS hash of the pin's image
params.title: Title of the pin

returns._0: uint256 ID of the created pin

params.pinId: ID of the pin to delete Requirements: - Only the pin owner can delete the pin

params.newBoardId: New Id if the board Requirements: - Only the pin owner can edit the pin - Pin with the given ID must exist
params.pinId: ID of the pin to edit

returns._0: Pin[] array containing all the pins

getPinById(uint256).details: Get pin information by its ID

params.pinId: ID of the pin to get

returns._0: Pin struct containing pin information Requirements: - Pin with the given ID must exist

getPinsByBoardId(uint256,address).details: Get all pins from a specific board owned by a specific address

returns._0: Pin[] array containing all the pins from the board and owner
